title: [Cancer] Brain tumors represent one of the most lethal cancer types, particularly among children. Diagnosing the type of tumor normally requires a biopsy and testing that takes up to a week. A new ultra-fast deep learning AI system allows diagnosis of the tumor type in less than 90 minutes during surgery.

[Medicine] A new AI tool that forecasts viral outbreaks has been developed using evolutionary, biological information. The tool successfully predicted the most concerning new variants that occurred during the COVID-19 pandemic. It may help inform the development of new vaccines and therapies.
